About

Candid photography captured over perfect moments by an experienced well known photographer. Session 1 DayExperience 7 Yrs+ Includes :1 Candid Photographer + 1 Traditional Photographer + 1 Traditional Videographer + 30 Pages Album

Booking policies

Total Tax : 14.5 % is applicable on Food & Beverages (F&B)
Advance Amount : 50% of the estimated billing amount to be paid at the time of booking to confirm the venue and remaining amount need to be paid on the day of the event
